title: [GAMEPLAY] Missile collision detection can fail.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
1. Start up a game with Thresh and Blitzkrank on opposing teams.
2. Have Thresh stand within 500 units of Blitzkrank.
3. Have Blitzkrank facing Thresh directly.
4. Have Thresh cast Death Sentence (Hotkey: Q) directly at the center of Blitzkrank's model.
5. ---> Sometimes the missile projectile will not register as colliding with the unit.

This occurred during this match (early on in game time) if that helps with any server logging.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1865703943/32854?tab=overview

replies.body:
Hey ViperXL, were you ever able to reproduce this while blitzcrank was _still_?

I'm trying to understand exactly what is involved here and if blitzcrank is moving or not is very important to that.

It's hard to recall if Blitzkrank was stationary or if he was in between movement actions. In the moment, from memory, it felt like he stood still on purpose to block the hook for his ADC. I can't be sure, I can try to repro in a custom game later tonight.
